lyrics.name: Verse
lyrics: Saparu Khunu\nYala wo Khwopa dese\nweih pyawola x2

lyrics.name: Verse
lyrics: Campus ya cha misa yana\nG gu nhapu kwaye pyawola
O nhapuu, kwaye pyawola
Thwo nhapuu, kwaye pyawola

lyrics.name: Verse
lyrics: Yo Campus kumari\ncha chya thuli balata x2
Rajamati Kumati, Parbati\nna chakhi lata x2

lyrics.name: Verse
lyrics: Cha da swoya nyaschya wo\ndwo nhyu the nhili lata x2
Hey nyaschya wo\ndukucha nhyu the nhili lata

lyrics.name: Verse
lyrics: Chanu changu chen swo woya  \nthage puya sahme neh la ta
O ratna
thage puya dhau baji phwe la ta

lyrics.name: Verse
lyrics: Mohni bale\nYala wo Khwopa dese\nPayo nhyakala x2

lyrics.name: Verse
lyrics: Campus ya cha misa yana\nG gu mane dhime thakala
O ratna
Bhusya thakala
O ratna
Pasima thakala

lyrics.name: Verse
lyrics: Yo Campus Kumari\nChya G Chanta Swe la ta x2
Cha bhaat du gu masyu\nmwa sa mwa sa khwe la ta x2

lyrics.name: Verse
lyrics: Cha da swoya nyaschya wo\nPrem ya mi na chwe la ta x2
Ehh nyaschya wo\nLove Letter chwe la ta

lyrics.name: Verse
lyrics: Chim bhaat liu liu chanta khana\nAila tyona pungya lhwe la ta
O ratna
Dachinya lhwe la ta
O ratna
Parke lhwe la ta
Chim aabu ya lakme lhwe la ta
